lines.text: I thought you said you didn't like violence?
I said I didn't believe in it. I never said I didn't like it.
You can go back to your boyfriend, husband, lover job. You can go on with your life.

[hiding in a dark restroom, the sound of water hitting water]
What are you doing?
What does it sound like I'm doing?
Now is a good as time as any if you...
Why do I live here? The city is death!

[calling out]
John. What's your last name?
I'm really glad you're here John.
You're not used to violence are you? It's all around us, you just never think about it. But you do lock your door at night, and tonight you're on the other side of that door.
